text: Bus stop with scenic views of field at MPC @ Khatib breezy greenery away from busy cityscapes. Besides buses serving Woodlands Yishun Sembawang there are direct Express buses to Bukit Batok Bedok Bukit Merah Lorong 1 Geylang Harbour Front Sengkang MRT bus interchange Compass One Punggol MRT bus interchange Tempines MRT bus interchange Tampines One and Tempines Concourse. Walking distance to Khatib MRT with POSB OCBC ATM and Giant supermarket. Walking distance to POSB Khatib Fairprice Yishun Ring Road Khatib Central Shopping Mall Nee Soon South Town Council Nee Soon South Community Club Saizeriya Khatib Home Team NS 7 Eleven Convenient store Coffee Shop 810 Yishun Ring Road Welcome Cafe & Fusion Restaurant Boardway Coffee Shop and Mr Teh Tarik Coffee Shop with freshly prepared food with healthy ingredients tender loving skillful cooking and warm services. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students expats locals visitors and families.

Very easy to access bus services, just opposite kathib mrt station. If you are too tired to climb up the overhead bridge, the overhead bridge does have lift at both sides of the bridge which you can just take. Speaking from past experience
Bus stop next to mrt, very convenient
